HotelElement.Name: The Inn At Rancho Santa Fe

Description.Text: The Inn at Rancho Santa Fe is located on 21 acres of landscaped grounds including flowering gardens, lush lawns and winding pathways between cottages of beautifully appointed guest rooms and suites. Located just 30 minutes north of San Diego International Airport and minutes from the beaches and charming seaside towns of Del Mar, Solana Beach, and La Jolla. From guestrooms and suites to individual cottages and spacious residences, this Southern California hotel near San Diego provides its guests with a plethora of choices for the perfect stay. The spa, a 3,000 square foot full service spa and relaxation courtyard area offers guests and residents a new sanctuary to relax and be pampered.
